page.title: 13HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The health centre at Hadston serves the needs of the local community. It has a play area for children, waiting room and reception area, rooms for storing records of patients, especially those of local schoolchildren. There are many posters giving information and many magazines to help pass the time for those waiting for attention. During a week there are many different activities in the health centre. Here are some of the sessions and classes: physiotherapy, relaxation for mothers to be, help for obesity, antenatal classes, general child welfare sessions and social services. In the centre are three consulting rooms for doctors. The three doctors are Dr. Creighton, Dr. Donald and Dr. McBride. There is a separate room for the dentist, Mr. Nutt.
